blocking just do it things just plain look and drape better after blocking blocking gives your stitches a chance to lock into place and opens up the stitch pattern blocking is also a way to coax your garment into the shape you want when the yarn is washable i wet block nearly everything i crochet whether it looks like it needs it or not completely immerse the piece in a sink of cool water without
